name: JJ's Slots 2
description:
This is the sequel to JJ's slot machine. It features 3 different machines you can switch between, and runs based on matches rather than 20 lines like a standard slot machine.

Art Credits:

forest background - ansimuz (opengameart.org) https://opengameart.org/content/forest-background

Slot machine resource pack - cougarmint (opengameart.org) https://opengameart.org/content/slot-machine-resource-pack

Handpainted RPG icons - LudicArts (opengameart.org) https://opengameart.org/content/handpainted-rpg-icons

Items icons - Lanot Designs (purchased)

Separated Logo - Tellmehow_ (purchased)

Separated background image -Elizabethe Carson (purchased)
